Ice::

She changed into full polar bear. "Well? What do you think?"

She heard Veratis thoughts and frowned. "I don't know what else to 
do. I didn't even know I could do that?" She still felt tingly all 
over. 

She looked at Lunarpine. She tried to smile, but his thought read 
much like that of Veratis. She sighed and lowered her head. "Yeah, I 
know. It's not good. But what else can I do?"

She walked over to a corner and layed down. She put her massive head 
on her huge paws and gave a deep sigh. She wasn't sure what was 
happening to her or what would happen next. She thought to 
Veratis. "I have two modes and an inbetween mode. I lost my bot mode 
entirely. I'm no longer a transformer. I'm a freak of nature now."

She was feeling down. She was now bigger than Veratis and Lunarpine. 
She was now afraid that if she moved the wrong way, she could hurt 
them. She saw how Veratis jumped when she put her head near him to 
nuzzle his shoulder.  She couldn't stay here and have her love fear 
her or her modes. She sighed and hoped they would find a solution 
soon.  AS she closed her eyes, she changed into the griffen mode 
without realizing it. She opened her eyes and stared down the long 
beak of the owl.  She jumped and looked at herself. Her wings were 
there on her back and her head was that of the owl. She layed back 
down and sighed. She was starting to feel depressed. She looked up at 
Lunarpine. "well, sparring is out.....for good." 

She changed back into polar bear as she rested her head back down and 
started to sleep in the corner. But her mind was still working. She 
could still hear thier thoughts, even in her sleep. And controlling 
the projection of her dreams was something she had no control over 
yet.
